Today marks the 24th anniversary of the Belfast (Good Friday) Agreement, the bedrock of peace, stability & prosperity in NI today.

It has had a fundamental role in the huge progress of the past decades.

We will ensure it is always paramount and peace & stability are protected. https://t.co/VJh1eGcawt

Call with German FM @ABaerbock to coordinate our work stepping up sanctions on Russia, supplying more lethal aid to Ukraine and holding Putin and his regime to account for appalling war crimes.🇬🇧 🇩🇪 https://t.co/mezNr5WbVx

NEW: Additional UK lethal aid to support Ukraine against Russia’s continued illegal assault:

➡️ 120 more armoured vehicles
➡️ New anti-ship missile systems
➡️ All in addition to the £100m of high-grade military equipment announced yesterday https://t.co/4SQEHOCuNc

NEW: Economic steps to support Ukraine as they defend their country from Russian agression:
➡️Tariff free imports to UK on all goods from 🇺🇦
➡️Extra $500m in World Bank lending taking total to almost $1bn
➡️Expedited £3.5bn UKEF support and £400m grants

https://t.co/FjxvTB4wd7
We #StandWithUkraine 🇬🇧🇺🇦 https://t.co/NZ2QgYBce8

Visited the new £1.5 million Elm House temporary accommodation centre in Thetford and further new homes being built.

It will support up to 35 residents in need of emergency support. 

Well done to @BreckCouncil on an excellent facility. 🏠 https://t.co/1Akp94YqDz

NEW: The UK has announced further military aid to Ukraine, including over 800 anti-tank missiles and air defence systems. 

Russia is opening a new offensive in the east of Ukraine. The UK along with G7 partners are sending heavier weapons to ensure Ukraine prevails. 🇬🇧 🇺🇦 https://t.co/ujnIuodmDo

I welcome efforts to form a more representative government in Yemen, and the Saudi and Emirati announcement of a $3 billion aid package. 

All parties should work with the @OSE_Yemen towards political negotiations for peace.

Appalled by the horrific reports of Russian rocket attacks on civilians at Kramatorsk railway station in Eastern Ukraine. 

The targeting of civilians is a war crime. We will hold Russia and Putin to account.

Our sanctions are hitting those closest to Putin and degrading Russia’s economy on a scale unseen since the fall of the Soviet Union.
 
But we need to go further. Together, with our allies, we will keep toughening sanctions until Russia withdraws.
https://t.co/RE6rtJaOgF

NEW: Our fleet of British ambulances are on the way to Lviv to support the people of Ukraine, providing urgent care to areas in need.

We #StandWithUkraine 🇺🇦🇬🇧 https://t.co/VqrLtTN7Ii

Appalled by the latest reports from Tel Aviv, where innocent people enjoying a Thursday night with friends and family were targeted by gunfire. 

The UK stands with Israel and against this abhorrent violence. 🇮🇱🇬🇧

It’s time for a new approach to security in Europe - based on resilience, defence and deterrence.

Today in Brussels I urged our @G7 and @NATO allies from around the world to go further to stand up to Putin’s barbaric actions in Ukraine. https://t.co/CLmWdFTkOC

Positive momentum at @NATO. We agreed to step up support for Ukraine as they respond to a new, more concentrated Russian offensive.

We have not just seen the shattering of European security but the shattering of global security. The entire free world must respond. https://t.co/TEIkRBGVtN

UN General Assembly has voted overwhelmingly to suspend Russia from UN Human Rights Council.

The barbaric actions of Putin’s regime in Ukraine and the mounting evidence of war crimes mean Russia can no longer have a seat on the @UN_HRC.

Russia is a global pariah. https://t.co/RIrFy4KD5m

.@G7 is united in response to Putin’s appalling war.

Leaders and Foreign Ministers have agreed:
➡️ More sanctions to strengthen Ukraine’s hand
➡️ Condemn the atrocities in Bucha
➡️ Severe consequences for use of chemical or biological weapons

Statement:👇https://t.co/jxz2NuhK4A

My message to our G7 and NATO allies today is simple. The only thing Putin understands is strength. Together with our allies we are keeping the pressure up with more sanctions, weapons and ending imports of Russian energy.

🇬🇧 🇺🇸 🇩🇪 🇫🇷 🇮🇹 🇨🇦 🇯🇵 🇪🇺 https://t.co/2kzyAg94FN

Read my piece in @Telegraph
on how NATO must be bold. As President Eisenhower, the alliance’s first supreme commander, said: “History does not long entrust the care of freedom to the weak or the timid.”👇

https://t.co/YbyenP1gc8

Tonight I met Quint Foreign Ministers @SecBlinken @JY_LeDrian @ABaerbock @LuigiDiMaio

Putin has changed his tactics, not his intent. We agreed to double down efforts to support Ukraine in the face of Russian aggression. 

 🇬🇧🇺🇸🇫🇷🇩🇪🇮🇹 https://t.co/nGe8KmH2T6

Our new sanctions will debilitate the Russian economy further:
👉End all Russian energy imports
👉Assets frozen of Russia’s largest bank, Sberbank
👉Total ban on new outward investment to Russia https://t.co/qmdcgz1GZe

We're going further to cripple Putin’s war machine.

Today I have announced our toughest sanctions yet - targeting Russia's energy industry, as well as hitting more banks, businesses and oligarchs who are financing Russia's abhorrent crimes in Ukraine. 👇

https://t.co/ulzEXhgV4S

The UK is doing everything possible to help the people of Ukraine amid Putin's appalling war.

We’re providing food, medicine and generators. Today, we’re donating world class @nhsuk ambulances to bring life-saving care.

https://t.co/tdA6oWLtIm
The United Kingdom, together with our allies, are doing everything we can to support the Ukrainian people in their hour of need. https://t.co/XgLe5GG9l1

Now more than ever the UK needs to deepen its security and defence relations with its closest allies. 

We are moving #AUKUS forward with a new commitment to expand cooperation in areas including hypersonics and electronic warfare. 🇬🇧🇦🇺🇺🇸 

https://t.co/q9qrtpdQAb

Important speech from @ZelenskyyUa on need to reform global security architecture. Putin needs to lose in Ukraine and Russian aggression has to be stopped for good. 

UK is using our presidency of the Council to hold Russia to account. 🇬🇧 🇺🇦 https://t.co/YhJ2aBGqsg

The UK and Poland are united in supporting Ukraine and coordinating sanctions to cripple Putin's war machine.

Good discussion with Foreign Minister @RauZbigniew. We will continue to work together to make sure Putin fails in Ukraine and to punish him for his actions. 🇬🇧🇵🇱 https://t.co/aHAcstyWKR

Spoke to Italian Foreign Minister @luigidimaio about tackling the income that is funding Putin’s regime. 

We need to step up our coordinated sanctions to end Russia’s war in Ukraine. 🇬🇧🇮🇹 https://t.co/cjtKDi3TKI

Met Polish PM @MorawieckiM in Warsaw to discuss UK-Poland cooperation and the situation in Ukraine. 

We share a strong security and defence relationship, and are determined to step up our efforts to make sure Putin fails. 🇬🇧 🇵🇱 🇺🇦 https://t.co/nsKmapxQDI

Good to speak with Japanese Foreign Minister @hayashi09615064 ahead of #G7 meetings this week.

We agreed that the international community must increase pressure on Putin and his war machine with further coordinated sanctions. https://t.co/1phFj8Yw0f

Appalling reports of rape and sexual violence being perpetrated in Ukraine. 

Earlier with @DmytroKuleba the UK announced £10m to 🇺🇦 organisations inc those helping women and girls affected by sexual violence in conflict.

The use of rape as a weapon of war is a war crime. https://t.co/7tjlqCFVMn

Welcomed Ukraine’s Foreign Minister @DmytroKuleba to British Embassy in Warsaw. 

We need to be tougher on Russia to ensure Putin loses in Ukraine which means more weapons and more sanctions.

We will not waver. 🇬🇧🇺🇦 https://t.co/hKnjIGt7nJ

The UK, Poland and our allies are stepping up the pressure on Russia over its illegal invasion of Ukraine.

I’m in Warsaw to talk to the Polish government, our steadfast partners in supporting Ukraine. 🇬🇧🇵🇱🇺🇦 https://t.co/FPE7cZEzt4

Given strong evidence of war crimes, including reports of mass graves and heinous butchery in Bucha, Russia cannot remain a member of the UN Human Rights Council. 

Russia must be suspended.

Reports of shallow graves outside Kyiv are truly horrifying. 

We are working with allies and the ICC to ensure the perpetrators are held to account.

We will not rest until Russia has paid the price for these appalling crimes.

We’re proud to fly the @NATO flag over @FCDOGovUK today. NATO’s commitment to collective defence remains as crucial to international security as it did 73 years ago. 

We are resolute in our support for Ukraine. #WeAreNATO https://t.co/Eu0mkS1AEV

Russia is still blocking life-saving humanitarian support from reaching Mariupol, despite repeated promises not to.

It must allow aid agencies access to reach those in vital need of support, whoever and wherever they are.

Spoke with @melaniejoly on the need for even tougher sanctions on Russia.

Energy dependence on Russia must end to cut off funding to Putin's war machine.

Together we #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/ZCqKUvRvBB

We must hold to account those responsible for the appalling acts committed by Russian troops in Bucha, Irpin and elsewhere in Ukraine. 

Putin’s regime will not be allowed to cover up their involvement in these atrocities.

https://t.co/fB2C4jz5M9

Britain has stepped up with our allies and partners to support our brave Ukrainian friends in their fight.

Together, we cannot rest until Ukraine prevails and Putin fails. 

Read my piece in @TheSun 👇
https://t.co/001uGNBD88

Appalled by atrocities in Bucha and other towns in Ukraine. Reports of Russian forces targeting innocent civilians are abhorrent. 
 
The UK is working with others to collect evidence and support @IntlCrimCourt war crimes investigation. Those responsible will be held to account.

Terrible news about the devastating fire in Hargeisa, Somaliland - it has now been brought under control. 

The UK is working with the authorities and international partners to seek to provide support. My thoughts are with all those affected.

Today marks the 40th anniversary of the illegal invasion of the Falkland Islands. We remember with sadness the more than 900 lives lost in the Falklands War.

The Falklands are part of the British family and we will always defend their right to self determination 🇬🇧 🇫🇰 https://t.co/Kk7EkndfaB
Wishing Muslims in Britain and around the world a blessed #Ramadan

Welcome the @OSE_Yemen brokered two-month truce in Yemen. An overdue opportunity for political progress. 

The people of Yemen deserve peace and security.

https://t.co/a6917375S1

Spoke with @SecBlinken today about the situation in Ukraine. 

We agreed that pressure on Russia must continue and we will work to eliminate dependency on Russian energy.

With our allies we will continue to support Ukraine 🇬🇧 🇺🇸 🇺🇦 https://t.co/uOJentrDQ8

🇬🇧🇮🇳 Great to be back in India this week.

We're building on security, defence and economic ties, keeping our people safe and providing more opportunities for British and Indian businesses. https://t.co/tG1y9JSi0Q

Great to launch 🇬🇧 🇮🇳 Strategic Futures Forum #IUSFF with my friend @DrSJaishankar  

We underlined our commitment to build closer defence, security and economic ties to make both our countries safer and more resilient. https://t.co/jXkyQsZjqW

Delighted to be back in Delhi again

Met Finance Minister @nsitharaman & National Security Adviser Doval to discuss the deepening economic & security relationship between 🇬🇧 & 🇮🇳 

Agreed to do even more to diversify supply chains, boost trade & tech ties & collaborate on defence https://t.co/l1nQDP95MZ

Putin's war on Ukraine is founded on lies. Today I have announced new sanctions targeting Russian state media and the Kremlin mouthpieces who spew Putin’s propaganda. 

This includes Mikhail Mizintsev, responsible for the appalling shelling of Mariupol 👇  https://t.co/iz1yQh6xgP https://t.co/cpkELBuk1Y

Read my article in @thetimes on how the systematic erosion of liberty in Hong Kong has made British judges' position untenable 👇
https://t.co/hfLi2mKHN3

Great to be in Oman with my good friend @badralbusaidi who has helped so much in securing the recent release of Nazanin and Anoosheh from Iran. 

We agreed to continue working closely and further strengthen the 🇬🇧 🇴🇲 relationship. https://t.co/0qcVxjsmqK

Today we have unlocked new legal powers to prohibit maintenance on luxury jets and superyachts owned by sanctioned Russian oligarchs. 

Our tough sanctions are targeting those closest to Putin to ensure he fails in Ukraine. https://t.co/q4wQclbzI6

Vital UK aid supplies have left Heathrow and Dubai today to bring life-saving assistance to the people of Ukraine, including:

🩺 Medicines and medical equipment

🏠 Blankets, cooking and hygiene kits

We will continue to #StandWithUkraine through this crisis. https://t.co/3xjIKfrGUC

Great honour to meet Sultan of Oman His Majesty Sultan Haitham bin Tarik. 

I thanked him for Oman's support in the release of British detainees from Iran.

Our two nations continue to strengthen our very firm friendship. 🇬🇧🤝🇴🇲 https://t.co/lLBf0QGTUm

Tomorrow the UK is co-hosting an international pledging conference tackling the humanitarian crisis in Afghanistan.

We are rallying countries in support of the Afghan people, and leading the way in providing essential food, shelter and health supplies https://t.co/Jzk7d5zWNF
Well done @JamieWallisMP for speaking out and your brave statement. We stand with you. https://t.co/CUmgCbIS37

China continues to use the National Security Law to grossly undermine Hong Kong’s fundamental rights and freedoms.


I have concluded that it is no longer tenable for British judges to sit on the Hong Kong’s leading court. @uksupremecourt 👇

https://t.co/Dd2nkMR0M0 https://t.co/RzQPwjhHJC

I am deeply saddened by another terrible terror attack in Israel today. My thoughts are with the Israeli people, especially those affected. 

The UK condemns this horrifying and senseless violence.

Putin continues to use abhorrent tactics against the Ukrainian people, including abducting innocent civilians.

He is not achieving his objectives and is resorting to desperate measures.

Putin must fail in Ukraine. #thetaken https://t.co/ydgbvdZI1P

Shocked by the appalling terror attack in Israel this evening.

I condemn this devastating violence and my thoughts are with the victims and their families. 

We stand with Israel 🇮🇱🇬🇧

Just Announced: We’re providing £2 million in vital food supplies for areas of Ukraine encircled by Russian forces 

We stand firmly with our Ukrainian friends 🇬🇧🇺🇦 

Full story 👇

https://t.co/JBT5acw2wc

Visited the Ukrainian Social Club in Bolton with @mark_logan_mp. 

Inspired by the resolve, courage and determination of Ukrainians in the UK doing all they can to help their countrymen.

We continue to do all we can to support Ukraine. 🇬🇧🇺🇦 https://t.co/WYWTCTZNc0

An abhorrent attack in Jeddah today, which follows similar terrorist attacks by the Houthis last weekend. I condemn this reckless act and call for an immediate halt to the violence. https://t.co/ghWPMRAbuA

The UK and G7 allies condemn North Korea’s reckless ballistic missile test. These acts threaten peace and security. 

North Korea must return to dialogue and abandon its nuclear & ballistic programmes in a complete, verifiable and irreversible manner. https://t.co/Dy7pXTLDJf

Today I have written in German paper @FAZnet about how we’re working with #G7 partners to deliver the strongest sanctions the world has ever seen.

We will deepen our focus by zeroing in on new industries and individuals supporting Putin’s regime. 💬 🇬🇧🇩🇪

https://t.co/EaRkZQAdkC
Spoke to French FM @JY_LeDrian this morning. We discussed increasing support to Ukraine, tightening sanctions on Russia and how to make sure Putin fails. https://t.co/YEKFSjsHqt

I join @ABaerbock @MarisePayne and other fellow female Foreign Ministers in calling on the Taliban to live up to their commitments and allow women and girls access to education.

Every Afghan citizen has an equal right to an education at all levels. https://t.co/SSkfMTywtO

The Taliban’s decision to shut school doors to girls is unjustifiable. Denying their right to an education contradicts assurances given to the Afghan people.
 
Every Afghan has an equal right to education - the Taliban should reverse this decision. 👇

https://t.co/JaZC3QMs7C

Today the UK has exposed, along with the US, the threat to global security posed by Russian hacking.

In response, we sanctioned a Russian research institute that attacked critical infrastructure. With our allies, we will continue to sanction Russia and starve Putin’s war machine https://t.co/2KTiplkj2J

Met colleagues from 🇺🇸🇭🇺🇳🇴🇦🇱🇮🇹 and many others at #G7 and #NATO.

We are working together to ensure Putin fails in Ukraine through security support to 🇺🇦 and tough sanctions on Russia. @SecBlinken @luigidimaio https://t.co/XVVCrW0GKr

Yesterday, Russia was isolated in the Security Council. Its resolution failed to get more than 2 votes.

Today, 140 countries voted with Ukraine, making clear Russia is to blame for this catastrophe.

🇬🇧 is working with allies to isolate Russia. Putin must fail in Ukraine. https://t.co/aTVYNz31yt

Met Spanish FM @jmalbares. UK and Spain are committed to increasing pressure on Putin for his unprovoked aggression against Ukraine.

We also talked about Gibraltar and the UK-EU treaty negotiations. 

We are determined to make progress. I will protect UK sovereignty. 🇬🇧 🇬🇮 🇪🇸 https://t.co/dqTRMynics

Spoke to @WBHoekstra about further coordinated sanctions against Putin and those who support him.

The Netherlands and UK will continue to firmly and swiftly impose crippling economic measures on Russia’s war machine. 🇬🇧 🇳🇱 https://t.co/rjJ7utYgjY
Arrived in Brussels with @BorisJohnson. Today @NATO and #G7 allies stand together stronger than ever to show Putin how badly he has misjudged our resolve. https://t.co/royxM9stcM

The UK has already sanctioned over 1,000 individuals and businesses since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. 

Today, I announce 65 more including the Wagner Group of mercenaries, Foreign Minister Lavrov’s step-daughter and the CEO of Russia’s largest bank. https://t.co/708EBGJrDm

It’s a month since Russia started its unprovoked invasion of Ukraine. 

Today @BorisJohnson & I are in Brussels for @NATO and #G7.

We will continue to work with allies to support Ukraine, debilitate Putin’s war machine economy & deter Russian aggression. https://t.co/mYowkYWt4C

PRESSURE UP: Today at @NATO the Prime Minister has announced more UK support. @FCDO is providing £25m of funding for Ukraine’s armed forces. We will continue to support Ukraine’s brave resistance in all the ways we can short of UK military intervention. https://t.co/QuqVtl1IV5

PUTIN MUST FAIL: United together, UK and its Allies and partners will not stop until the sovereignty of Ukraine is restored. We will continue to take action to defend our borders, support Ukraine and stand together in the face of Russian aggression.

TOGETHER: In response to Russia’s unprovoked attack on Ukraine, UK, Allies and Partners immediately acted to provide 1,000s of anti-tank weapons, 100s of air-defence missiles, 1,000s of small arms and ammunition stocks. Providing millions of £s of financial assistance and aid.

STRONGER: As Russia continued to prepare for invasion on Ukraine’s borders, @NATO acted to strengthen our collective defence. This included 1,000s of troops to the Eastern part of the Alliance; 100 jets on high alert, 120 ships and 3 strike carrier groups.

WARNING: As Russian troops were positioned on Ukraine’s border, the UK and its @NATO Allies and partners warned that any incursion would be a strategic mistake with massive consequences. We made plans to impose severe costs on Russia should it invade.
Today @BorisJohnson and I are at the @NATO Summit to discuss further steps to reassure Allies and deter any threats to NATO after Russia’s unprovoked invasion of Ukraine.

The @G7 are acting in unison on Russian sanctions.

We are crippling Putin’s war machine by denying him access to the money & support he needs to fund his illegal war. 

We will continue to work together to bring this war to an end. 

🇬🇧🇺🇸🇨🇦🇫🇷🇩🇪🇮🇹🇯🇵🇪🇺 https://t.co/kaAS3QtHTx

🇬🇧🇺🇦 Good to hear orphan children from @DniproKids have safely arrived in the UK from Ukraine.

Thank you to the @UKinPoland team who helped them.

The UK is committed to supporting those forced to flee Ukraine and getting humanitarian aid to help those caught in the fighting.

Resounding defeat for Russia’s proposed Security Council resolution. The international community sees through Putin’s disinformation & overwhelmingly recognises that Russia is the aggressor. Russia’s text was an insult to Ukraine. We will not stand for it. https://t.co/I3TRP68T74

Spoke to Saudi Arabia’s @FaisalbinFarhan. The UK is committed to working with international partners to call out Russia’s egregious use of violence in Ukraine and to support the humanitarian response. It is vital that the @UN speaks with one voice. https://t.co/7vU4ZB9dbz

So sorry to hear of the death of  Madeleine Albright.

She was the first female US Secretary of State and a huge champion of freedom and democracy.

We need to stand by these values now more than ever. https://t.co/FC4YSWVkPt

The Putin regime knows no bounds when it comes to fighting those who dare to speak out against it. 

I condemn the politically-motivated sentence imposed on @Navalny and call on the Kremlin to release him immediately.

Good to speak to Ukrainian FM @DmytroKuleba. We discussed how the UK, alongside #G7 allies and partners, will increase  economic pressure against Putin’s regime. 

We will not stop in our mission to cut off funds for Russia’s brutal war machine. https://t.co/fUzddHkaQv

Appalled by the terror attack in Be’er Sheva, Israel this afternoon.

The UK stands in solidarity with the people of Israel and my thoughts are with the victims and their families 🇮🇱🇬🇧

Phone call with @ABaerbock ahead of G7 on how 🇬🇧 and 🇩🇪 are supporting Ukraine by:

👉 Cooperating on humanitarian support

👉 Coordinating sanctions on Russia

👉 Reducing reliance on Russian energy https://t.co/Hdt5Az1LFw

Met Gibraltar 🇬🇮 Chief Minister @FabianPicardo
👉 We're working together to agree treaty with EU to secure prosperity of Gibraltar and the region. 
👉 We will not compromise on sovereignty.
👉 Welcome Gibraltar’s seizure of Dmitry Pumpyansky’s super yacht following UK sanctions. https://t.co/QWgtqlqYKF

A year after China applied sanctions, we stand in solidarity with the parliamentarians, lawyers and academics who continue to fight for the Uyghurs in Xinjiang. 

We are working together to hold China to account for its human rights violations. https://t.co/DKAZzHsNM9

Harry Dunn’s family are in my thoughts and have my full support. I know how painful the anniversary of Harry’s birthday will be without justice yet being fulfilled. We continue to stress to our counterparts in the USA the importance of the virtual trial taking place urgently.

Good to meet @oleksiireznikov, Ukrainian Defence Minister with @BWallaceMP. 

We continue to support Ukraine - putting tough sanctions on Russia with our G7 allies, supplying defensive weapons and providing humanitarian support.

 #StandWithUkraine️ https://t.co/zy1b6jH3iR

I am appalled by Russian atrocities in Mariupol, including attacks on schools sheltering civilians and the abduction and deportation of Ukrainians.

Putin is resorting to desperate measures as he is not achieving his objectives. Putin and his regime will be held to account.

Good to speak to @JosepBorrellF about how G7 🇬🇧 🇺🇸 🇨🇦 🇯🇵 🇩🇪 🇫🇷 🇮🇹 🇪🇺 has worked together to impose severe costs on Russia. 
Working on next steps ahead of G7 Leaders meeting this week. https://t.co/29XkZH9lUR

Great being back in Blackpool for @Conservatives Spring Conference #CPSC22

I am proud that at this moment of peril, our government has stepped up to lead. https://t.co/RX9RZOYDDm
Watch live: 💬 My speech from @Conservatives Spring Conference #CPSC22 https://t.co/KGCh0bJNvE

Read my interview in @thetimes on how we need to be tough to secure peace.👇

https://t.co/L62yWZYyAV

Happy Holi to everyone celebrating in India, across the UK and around the world.

May the festival of colour bring you joy and peace. #Holi2022

Good meeting with #G7 🇨🇦🇫🇷🇩🇪🇮🇹🇯🇵🇺🇸🇪🇺. We are united in our response to Russia’s war against Ukraine. We agreed to: 

🛡 scale up the humanitarian response

🌍 isolate Russia in international fora 

📉 go further and faster on sanctions https://t.co/vznVApt8JK
A very happy St Patrick’s Day to our friends celebrating around the world! ☘️
Great to see both Anoosheh and Nazanin in such good spirits. An emotional moment for both families as they welcome them home. https://t.co/ewtFeaYJ1s
Pleased Morad Tahbaz has been released on furlough and is reunited with his family in Iran, but this is far from sufficient. We will continue to work intensively to secure his departure from Iran.
Delighted that Nazanin and Anoosheh have landed safely in the UK and are reunited with their families and loved ones. Welcome home.

The release of Nazanin, Anoosheh and Morad is the result of the efforts and dedication of many people both in the FCDO and across government.

I pay tribute to my predecessors and the PM, who have all worked hard to resolve this issue, and to our brilliant diplomats and officials
Grateful to our Omani friends for their work in helping to secure the release of our British nationals today. https://t.co/wQbc0M0hGE
I am delighted that Nazanin, Anoosheh and Morad have been released by the Iranians and will be reunited with their families and loved ones. https://t.co/2EG0NR7UC8

The release of our British nationals from detention in Iran is news the whole country can rejoice in. I’m sure we all share in the huge relief the detainees and their families must be feeling. My statement in full 👇
https://t.co/xwdijJo0hV

I can confirm Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe and Anoosheh Ashoori will return to the UK today, and Morad Tahbaz has been released from prison on furlough. They will be reunited with their families later today.

We will continue to work to secure Morad's departure from Iran.

The UK is leading the way with our historic round of sanctions - further isolating Putin’s enablers for their illegal and unprovoked invasion of Ukraine.

https://t.co/rf7hwdjNYP https://t.co/2aOSOUgEQ4

Another #UKAid flight carrying medical supplies for Ukraine has taken off today – our ninth so far. 40 pallets from @NHSScotland, including resuscitators and ventilators on their way to people in need.

We continue to do all we can to support Ukraine 🇬🇧 🇺🇦 https://t.co/FwxsezN3HR
New Sanctions: https://t.co/rf7hwdjNYP

Sanctions Update: After today we will have designated over 1,000 individuals and entities since Russia’s invasion.

This includes over 370 new sanctions announced today - possible thanks to the new Economic Crime Act.

Putin must fail in Ukraine

Welcome news from @YairLapid that Israel will support sanctions against Russia.🇮🇱 
We are working with our allies and partners to apply pressure on Putin and challenge his unprovoked and needless attack on Ukraine.  https://t.co/FIgMLC0Dqw

UK stands by Australia and the Netherlands in calling on the Russian government to accept responsibility for the tragedy of MH17. 

We must deliver justice for the families of the victims. This is just another example of the Kremlin’s barbaric actions against innocent civilians.

Our family of Commonwealth nations are united in a commitment to freedom, democracy and peace.

Today we celebrate #CommonwealthDay, and together we will build a better, more secure future. https://t.co/KXMY0bFe6O
My statement 👇 condemning attempts by the Chinese and Hong Kong authorities to silence critics overseas @hk_watch. https://t.co/UeI0qHkqIK https://t.co/qZvzlWttYn

Thank you @NHSEngland, @UKinPoland for helping to ensure Ukrainian children are able to get to the UK to receive vital cancer treatment.

We are doing all we can to support those affected by this conflict. 🇬🇧🇺🇦 https://t.co/kUdvcUAxy1

Good to speak to @DmytroKuleba. The bravery of the Ukrainian leadership and people is immense.

🇬🇧 is doing all we can to support including defensive weapons and humanitarian aid.

The @UNOCHA warns of a severe shortage of medicines in Ukraine.

Spoken to my US counterpart @USTradeRep again re tariffs imposed on industries such as Scotch whisky as result of WTO ruling.

We will also bring the Trade Bill before Parliament to make the most of the opportunities that come from taking back control of our trade policy.  

Includes establishing an independent Trade Remedies Authority to combat unfair trading practices that disadvantage UK firms. 2/2

JUST IN: Our ambition is to cover 80% of total UK trade with free trade agreements by 2022.
